knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Reading tidy data

```{r echo=FALSE}


data.EU.1990 <- read.csv("Output_EU_1990.csv")
data.EU.2010 <- read.csv("Output_EU_2010.csv")
data.ROW.1990 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_1990.csv")
data.ROW.2010 <- read.csv("Output_ROW_2010.csv")

head(data.EU.1990)
head(data.EU.2010)
head(data.ROW.1990)
head(data.ROW.2010)

attach(data.EU.1990)
attach(data.EU.2010)
attach(data.ROW.1990)
attach(data.ROW.2010)

df.EU.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.1990$country, le=data.EU.1990$le,hale=data.EU.1990$hale, yld=data.EU.1990$yld, the=data.EU.1990$the)

df.EU.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.EU.2010$country, le=data.EU.2010$le,hale=data.EU.2010$hale, yld=data.EU.2010$yld, the=data.EU.2010$the)

df.ROW.1990 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.1990$country, le=data.ROW.1990$le,hale=data.ROW.1990$hale, yld=data.ROW.1990$yld, the=data.ROW.1990$the)

df.ROW.2010 <- data.frame(country=data.ROW.2010$country, le=data.ROW.2010$le,hale=data.ROW.2010$hale, yld=data.ROW.2010$yld, the=data.ROW.2010$the)

df.EU.1990
df.EU.2010
df.ROW.1990
df.ROW.2010

ID.EU <- "ITA"
ID.ROW.1 <- "JPN"
ID.ROW.2 <- "USA"

```



# Expansion of Morbidity WORLD: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.ROW.1990$hale, df.ROW.1990$yld, xlab="Health Adjusted Life Expectancy at Birth (hale)", ylab="Years Lived with Disease (YLD)", type="p", col="grey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=c(30, 75), ylim=c(4, 15), axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

points(df.ROW.2010$hale, df.ROW.2010$yld, col="darkslategrey", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)


points(df.EU.1990$hale, df.EU.1990$yld, col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

points(df.EU.2010$hale, df.EU.2010$yld,  col="red", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)


axis(1, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$hale), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(1, at=round(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$hale), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

text(40, 14.5, "EU 1990", col="blue")
text(40, 14, "EU 2010", col="red")
text(40, 13.5, "ROW 1990", col="grey")
text(40, 13, "ROW 2010", col="darkslategrey")

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1]+.3, labels=paste(ID.ROW.1, ""), cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)

ID.min = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == min(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.min

ID.max = df.ROW.2010$country[df.ROW.2010$yld == max(df.ROW.2010$yld)]
ID.max

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.min]+.2, labels=ID.min, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.max]+.2, labels=ID.max, cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

```



# Increased Expansion of Morbidity EU: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.EU.1990$hale, df.EU.1990$yld, xlab="Health Adjusted Life Expectancy at Birth (hale)", ylab="Years Lived with Disease (YLD)", col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=c(30, 75), ylim=c(4, 15), axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

points(df.EU.2010$hale, df.EU.2010$yld,  col="red", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

axis(1, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$hale), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(1, at=round(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$hale), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$hale), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(4, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

text(40, 14, "EU 1990", col="blue")
text(40, 13.5, "EU 2010", col="red")
text(40, 13, "JPN 2010", col="black")

points(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], col="black", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

text(df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1]+.3, labels=paste(ID.ROW.1, ""), cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .2)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$hale[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)


fun.EU.1990 <- lm(df.EU.1990$yld ~ df.EU.1990$hale)
abline(fun.EU.1990, lty = 2, col="blue", lwd=1.5)
summary(fun.EU.1990)
confint(fun.EU.1990)

fun.EU.2010 <- lm(df.EU.2010$yld ~ df.EU.2010$hale)
abline(fun.EU.2010, lty = 2, col="red", lwd=1.5)
summary(fun.EU.2010)
confint(fun.EU.2010)

```


# Increased Expenditure EU: 1990-2010

```{r}
par(mar=c(5, 4, 4, 5) + 0.1)

plot(df.EU.1990$yld, df.EU.1990$the, xlab="Years Lived with Disease", ylab="Per Capita Total Health Expenditure", col="blue", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2, xlim=c(8, 15), ylim=c(100, 7500), axes=FALSE, frame.plot=FALSE)

points(df.EU.2010$yld, df.EU.2010$the,  col="red", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

text(8.3, 6000, "EU 1990", col="blue")
text(8.3, 5500, "EU 2010", col="red")
text(8.3, 5000, "JPN 2010", col="black")

axis(1, at=c(round(min(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.1990$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.1990$yld), 1)), col.axis="blue", col="blue", las=2, cex.axis=0.7,  tick=-.01)

axis(1, at=round(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2), col.axis="black", col="black",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)


low.the.1990 <- round(min(df.EU.1990$the), 0)
median.the.1990 <- round(median(df.EU.1990$the), 0)
high.the.1990 <- round(max(df.EU.1990$the), 0)

axis(2, at=c(low.the.1990,median.the.1990, high.the.1990), col.axis="blue", col="blue",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(3, at=c(round(min(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(median(df.EU.2010$yld), 1), round(max(df.EU.2010$yld), 1)), col.axis="red", col="red", las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

low.the.2010 <- round(min(df.EU.2010$the), 0)
median.the.2010 <- round(median(df.EU.2010$the), 0)
high.the.2010 <- round(max(df.EU.2010$the), 0)
japan.the.2010 <- round(df.ROW.2010$the[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], 2)

axis(4, at=c(low.the.2010,median.the.2010, high.the.2010), col.axis="red", col="red",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

axis(2, at=japan.the.2010, col.axis="black", col="black",las=2, cex.axis=0.7, tick=-.01)

points(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$the[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], col="black", pch = 16, cex = 1.3, lty = "solid", lwd = 2)

text(df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], df.ROW.2010$the[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1]+200, labels=paste(ID.ROW.1, ""), cex= .8, pos=4, offset = .5)

abline(h=df.ROW.2010$the[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], v=df.ROW.2010$yld[df.ROW.2010$country == ID.ROW.1], lty=1, lwd=1)

```
